titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Goshen Irrigation District, Wyoming, certain lands and irrigation structures relating to the Fort Laramie Division of the North Platte Project.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer to the Goshen Irrigation District, Wyoming, certain lands and irrigation structures relating to the Fort Laramie Division of the North Platte Project, subject to specified requirements.
